name: anchor-shot
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Traps the target.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.
